      • resetPassword

        @POST("v2/passwords/reset")
retrofit2.Call<LoginResponse> resetPassword​(@Body
                                            ResetRequest request)
        Parameters:
        request - ResetRequest
        Returns:
        LoginResponse
        ImplNote:
        This will log the user out of all sessions and re-authenticate.

      • sendResetPassword

        @POST("v2/passwords/reset/send")
retrofit2.Call<NonceResponse> sendResetPassword​(@Body
                                                TargetRequest request)
        Parameters:
        request - TargetRequest
        Returns:
        NonceResponse
        ImplNote:
        Phone target must be a csv with 3 values: "internationalPrefixNumber,nationalNumber,countryCode"

      • changePassword

        @POST("v2/user/passwords/change")
retrofit2.Call changePassword​(@Body
                              PasswordChangeModel request)
        Parameters:
        request - Model
        Returns:
        Status Code
        ImplNote:
        The current password is needed for verification that the password can be changed.
